lead_paragraph: The Cubs hit four home runs, including a three-run shot by Alfonso Soriano in the sixth inning that gave Chicago its first lead, 6-4, against the Diamondbacks.
snippet: The Cubs hit four home runs, including a three-run shot by Alfonso Soriano in the sixth inning that gave Chicago its first lead, 6-4, against the Diamondbacks.

headline.main: Rays’ Error in 9th Opens Door for Royals
headline.seo: Rays’ Error in 9th Inning Opens Door for Royals
